item.title: Opportunities Bulletin
item.description: Here is a collection of opportunities spanning research projects, internships, hackathons, and more! This list is updated weekly. Week of Jan 10, 2021 QHack: QHack is a virtual hackathon hosted from Feb 17 to Feb 26th by Pennylane, a quantum machine learning company. Sign up here. Week of Jan 3, 2021 PHYS 345: Introduction to Quantum Information Processing and Communication Enroll in an excellent intro to QC taught by Prof Girvin in the Spring of 2021.
